name: Minra Defender #7dfps 2021
description:
Hiya Sweetitpies! Its your favorite Idol Dragon Minra!

I'm currently in the of a stream right now and I need your help! Every time I go live, and my own song plays, all these haters come by to try and kill me! I need you and your band of waifu simps to defeat the haters and stop them from stopping my stream!

Your goal is to find and collect the 6 waifus in the area and help defend Minra from the oncoming attacks.

The Gameplay is of a wave based survival fps that gets harder as time goes on with more enemies spawning in!

The music playing is Hello Hello by Minra

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Mouse - Aim and Look

Left Mouse - Fire

1 - Change weapon to AK47

3 - Change Weapon to Gao gun

esc - quit game

Credits:

programming/game design/music: It's Minra Vtube  - https://twitter.com/Its_Minra | https://twitch.tv/ItsMinra
